Privacy Policy

Effective Date: February 3, 2025

A Word Game (“the Game”) is developed by SG33 Games (“we,” “us,” or “our”). This Privacy Policy explains how we handle user data when you use our Game.

Information We Collect

We do not collect any personal data from users. However, if you choose to sign in with Google Play Services, your high scores may be submitted to Google Play Services leaderboards.

How We Use Information

The only data shared externally is high scores, which are sent to Google Play Services if the user chooses to sign in. We do not store or process this data ourselves.

Third-Party Services

Our Game integrates with Google Play Services. The handling of high scores and any associated data is subject to Google’s Privacy Policy. Please review Google’s policies for more details..

Your Choices

  • You can play the Game without signing in to Google Play Services. In this case, no data will be sent.

  • You can manage your Google Play Services settings via your Google account.

Security

We do not store or manage any personal data ourselves, and we rely on Google Play Services’ security measures for leaderboard submissions.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected in this document, with an updated effective date.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at sg33.games@gmail.com.
